casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. REESE
v.
DEPT. OF REHAB. & CORR. 2018-1183 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 13, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

Sua sponte, cause dismissed as untimely because the tolling provisions of the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio do not apply to appeals from original actions that were filed with the court of appeals.
